sourceMeaningMnemonic: You take a <radical>turkey</radical> and try to <radical>boil</radical> it but you <kanji>char</kanji> it instead. That's what happens when you throw meat into a pot on high with no water in there.
meaningInfo: You should know better than to try to boil something without water! Now what are you going to do with this raw, but charred turkey?!
readingMnemonic: You're staring sadly at the <kanji>char</kanji>red turkey when you suddenly sense the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>) looming behind you. You were supposed to be cooking this turkey for him and now he looks really, really mad.
readingInfo: The Shougun reaches down and bites a charred hunk off the turkey. He yells and spits it out. Why did he do that?! You have no idea but it looked nasty.
